### Exercise 4.4: Parenthesize the following expression to show how it is evaluated. Test your answer by compiling the expression (without parentheses) and printing its result.    12 / 3 * 4 + 5 * 15 + 24 % 4 / 2    = (( ((12/3) * 4) + (5 * 15) ) + ((24 % 4) / 2))    = (((4*4) + 75) + (0/2))       = ((16 + 75) + 0)    = (91 + 0)    = 91
